name: PollingTimeSlot
desc: Constants that specify the maximum number of time slots.

items.name: static var PollingTimeSlotMax1: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot
items.desc: A constant that indicates a maximum of one slot.

items.name: static var PollingTimeSlotMax2: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot
items.desc: A constant that indicates a maximum of two slots.

items.name: static var PollingTimeSlotMax4: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot
items.desc: A constant that indicates a maximum of four slots.

items.name: static var PollingTimeSlotMax8: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot
items.desc: A constant that indicates a maximum of eight slots.

items.name: static var PollingTimeSlotMax16: NFCFeliCaPollingTimeSlot
items.desc: A constant that indicates a maximum of sixteen slots.
